website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few concerns, this is a quality organic oil that's also thoughtfully produced, and includes a pump that's convenient to use.
pros: The pump applicator makes it less messy to apply than some other brands
cons: Although not scented, some bottles arrived with a rancid smell
Consistency is on the thick and sticky side

website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, you won't find a Moroccan oil product with a more versatile formula, better ingredients, or a more affordable price.
pros: Stands out for its organic, cold-pressed Moroccan argan oil that's formulated with vitamin E and antioxidants and ideal for hair, nails and skin
cons: Some customers gripe about the scent being unpleasant

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful jojoba oil!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged arrived well packed and no issues. I’ve ordered 2 bottles of this organic jojoba oil so far and lasts me about 5 months. Comes in a dark amber glass with a pump as well as a dropper. I love the pump and it has worked well in both orders. I use it daily for a facial moisturizer(and the hubby too) and also to remove my makeup. Sometimes as a body oil or for my cuticles. Highly recommend. No rancid smells. I’m a fan... I have it as a subscription now.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Strickland

customer_reviews.title: No more cystic acne
customer_reviews.text: I was using proactive religiously twice a day for YEARS and suddenly I was getting horrible cystic acne on my chin almost weekly. One wouldn't even die down and I would get another on top of it. I did some research and realized I was stripping my skin too much. I order this jojoba oil and an organic cold-pressed aloe vera, would add one to two drops of jojoba oil to some aloe vera in my hand and rub it on my dry parts of my face I have not had cystic acne since and it's been around 6 months. My skin is suddenly glowing. A little goes a loong way.
customer_reviews.author: Starwarsgeek

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant, light moisturizer for your face
customer_reviews.text: Product did not arrive rancid as other have stated. I am extremely picky with oil and got exactly what I expected. I have a very sensitive nose and the oil has no discernible smell whatsoever. It's considerably thinner than something like cooking oil, and a higher viscosity than mineral oil. I purchased this to replace a higher performance moisturizer from winter, with something less robust for summer use and this is the perfect choice. Thin, odorless, and moisturizes the exact amount I'm looking for after I wash my face.
customer_reviews.author: Trash Boat

customer_reviews.title: but the fine lines are gone
customer_reviews.text: I used a 50/50 blend of jojoba and argan oil to improve my complexion and lessen the appearance of wrinkles. I waited to write a review after I used it for a bit. After 10 days, applying in the morning 1/2 hour before I applied makeup, and at night before bed, I can honestly say it has made a difference. My skin is noticeably smoother. My main wrinkles are still there, but the fine lines are gone, and my face looks younger. I am 40 years old, and have always had sensitive skin. I didn't break out or have any bad reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Ladonna McBirney

customer_reviews.title: IM IN LOVE. WILL USE FOR FOREVER!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this oil. So much. I add it to my daily moisturizer AND I add a few drops to my shampoo and conditioner, as well. I have very sensitive skin and it doesn’t cause any irritation and really does make my hair and skin feel hydrated. Absolutely IN LOVE! Purchased a second bottle 4 days after receiving my 1st bottle, because I never want to run out! If you’re hesitating purchasing this; DONT! You won’t regret it. Buy it girrrrrl😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This oil makes me beautiful
customer_reviews.text: At first, I started the OCM method with rosehip oil only. It improved my acne, but only very slowly. I wanted to see if jojoba oil might do better for my skin. So I've been oil cleansing with rosehip oil, then moisturizing with jojoba oil. This oil is super soothing. It smells kinda like Doritos, but it's not too strong. I wear makeup everyday, and feel very insecure without it. After using this oil twice a day for a week, I've evolved from feeling like Quasimodo to feeling like a real girl. My skin is glowing and looks radiant and healthy. I can actually leave the house without a full face of makeup. Thank you, jojoba oil. I love you.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Zahid

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great product!!
customer_reviews.text: The amount you get for the price is amazing!! I have seen smaller bottles of argan oil for $100+ and I have tried to more expensive brands. However, I find no difference in the quality product. I plan to re-order several more bottles! I use the argan oil for EVERYTHING- as a face moisturizer, for my hair, as an eye serum, etc.. Argan oil does NOT clog pores like coconut pil so I feel comfortable using is on my face. Plus, since incorporating this argan oil into my beauty routine I notice complete decrease in face blemishes, like those pesky "period-time" pimples.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I'd been using another 'dry oil serum' from Merle Norman, it was ok, till I ran out & decided to try something else. This is very moisturizing, not oily feeling at all. I will purchase it again
customer_reviews.author: dmccoy

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.text: It's great for mixing with my foundation and as a deep moisturizer for my lips and undereye. Viva Naturals sent me a letter offering a free full sized bottle a few weeks after I received the one I ordered on Amazon- Awesome. All I had to do to receive the free bottle is email them with my amazon order #. I'm really happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Nothing about this product resembles Argan oil
customer_reviews.text: I should have known the price was too good to be true. Argan oil has a golden color. This was a clear white, definitely looked bleached if anything. And it didn't have that characteristic nutty smell - it smelled like cooking oil and weirdly like olives. If I had to guess it's probably a small amount of Argan oil, diluted in cooking oil. When I applied it to my face, it became itchy and irritated, almost physically felt it clogging my pores and drying my skin. I ordered this because of the claims of it being unrefined and cold pressed and felt severely misled by the descriptions. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Emm

customer_reviews.title: almost like cooking oil
customer_reviews.text: It feels a little too greasy, almost like cooking oil. I have extremely dry hands and I don't find it all that moisturizing.

customer_reviews.text: Rancid smells like i put car oil on my face. Im really pissed. The bottle says expires in Oct 2018. It smells way too strongly to be fresh. What a disappointment.

customer_reviews.text: It has very bad stench. It smell like it should go into a car. I tried some on my hair and I smelled like I was on a motorcycle. I have used one that is god. But I saw this one on the "Deals" I should have know. I hope they take it back.
customer_reviews.author: LB 27

customer_reviews.title: Sorry Viva, I love all your other products, but you do fail on this one!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry Viva, I love all your other products, but you do fail on this one! The smell was really gross & poopy, as other reviewers mentioned. I have never had an Argan oil smell like this. Not sure if they are getting bad batches, or if product sits around to long, but this was the grossest Argan oil I have ever smelled. Had to return it, which at least was a free Amazon return. BUT their other products, such as coco butter, sweet almond oil, ect have been great. (I don't like leaving bad reviews, but steer clear from this oil, or take a chance and return if you don't like it)
customer_reviews.author: SooZeeQ

customer_reviews.title: This oil smelled so bad, I couldn't even put it on my skin ...
customer_reviews.text: This oil smelled so bad, I couldn't even put it on my skin without getting sick. I called VIVA directly and they told me that some bottles may have a smell to it and to mask the smell with aromatherapy. It smelled so rancid, I put it in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Not Authentic Jojoba Oil
customer_reviews.text: This product does not seem to be authentic jojoba oil at all. It has a scent more similar to corn or soy oil. The color is also extremely pale, unlike the deep, golden color you should expect from true jojoba oil. I received a standard email from the company asking for my feedback and when I replied saying that the color and scent seemed inauthentic, they never responded. Unfortunately, I missed the Amazon return window, and so have wasted $11 (though their email claims to have a 90-day satisfaction guarantee). To their credit, the packaging was secure and good quality. And for what it's worth, I appreciate that they use glass and not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: BAJ

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for me...
customer_reviews.text: I'm an African American male who uses Argan Oil to moisturize & strengthen my hair & beard. I decided to try this brand bc its cheaper than the one I usually use. If you're seeking something supplemental to help with hair breakage, this works great. But if u need more moisturizing properties, this probably won't work well for u.
customer_reviews.author: G-$

customer_reviews.title: good skin and hair product
customer_reviews.text: Find this to be a great product for removing my eye make-up without irritation. Also a good conditioner for my hair. Apply before shampooing and rinse out with shampoo. Just takes a small amount for me, short hair, probably more if you have longer hair. Use about a tsp. myself and comb through hair before shampooing. Being older with gray hair, it sometimes gets dry. Feels wonderful on my face and makes my skin so soft. Good carrier oil for essential oils also. Like that it comes in a dark bottle, better to keep oils from going rancid. Jojoba is really a wax, but most people call it an oil I guess because it works kind of like oils.
customer_reviews.author: Dorrie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice natural oil moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I was using Trilane that my mother purchased for me, but the price was outlandish, so I wanted to try this. I prefer natural and organic, so this seemed like a good alternative and I really like it. Gives me the same moisture and texture as the Trilane at a better price and is healthier, too. My only complaint is the applicator is hard to press. Maybe just the bottle I received. It works, which is what's important, so it's not a big problem. I do recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Khanada Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Like!
customer_reviews.text: I use Jojoba Oil on my face as a moisturizer. I apply after a toner. And works well. But my skin doesn't really absorb it. It just sits in the surface. I really wish my skin would drink it up. I'm acne prone, and usually ANYTHING will make me break out, but this oil didn't. It has no smell. A little goes along way. I only use 4-5 drops for my face. It's too heavy for hair use. It just made my hair look really greasy like I hadn't washed it in a month.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste N.

customer_reviews.title: Pump/bottle super annoying
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great; I use jojoba oil on my hair and face and this is a nice quality one. But the pump is so annoying that I won't buy this brand again. First of all, it squirts out so much that many times the oil has splattered on my clothing, staining it. Secondly, now it has begun to leak; the bottle sits in a puddle of oil on my counter that I'm constantly mopping up. I have tried to tighten the cap but that is not the issue. Not sure if I got a faulty one or this is just what their product is, but either way, I'm annoyed!
customer_reviews.author: Megan C.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, horrible pump
customer_reviews.text: Only 3 stars because the pump is really bad. It is hard to push down and when actually pushed it shoots oil everywhere. I actually hurt myself pushing the pump cuz my finger slipped and hit a hard plastic edge on the pump. Product itself is 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Edddie

customer_reviews.title: Fixing my face with jojoba oil
customer_reviews.text: Recently moved to a cold dry environment. I never realized what it would do to my skin. It became so severely chapped and dried out that my face started to over produce oil to compensate which resulted in horrible painful acne on chapped skin. It was embarrassing and so painful. I came across jojoba oil and decided to give it a try. I've been using it for 2 weeks as my primary moisturizer and I have had amazing results. My skin is healthy, moisturized, and my acne is almost completely resolved. Jojoba oil provides what my skin needs but without the pore clogging elements in so many products.
customer_reviews.author: AZmom

customer_reviews.title: For that Price!!! <3
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered my 2nd bottle of this. This is an amazing prize for an organic argan oil. The size, 4oz, is a really great size too. I have about a quarter bottle left and I use this as a daily face moisturizer, straight from the bottle. I also use this in my hair on a daily too, straight from the bottle. I throw this i different body mixes I make as well, body butters, etc. Moisturizes my hair and skin really well. Loving it!
customer_reviews.author: MeShell

customer_reviews.title: Not the same quality it used to be... possibly not even Argan oil at all.
customer_reviews.text: This Argan oil is clear and odorless, I can't even tell if it is truly Argan oil. My last purchase of same oil (same brand, same exact product) is a light amber color and has a fragrance that consists of mixed sweet fruity and nutty tones which was the same as the Argan oil that my hair dresser had used previously that got me liking Argan oil (different brand, same product). I will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Leave a terrible oily residue
customer_reviews.text: I use argan oil everyday on my hair and I wanted to try something new. I bought this argan oil thinking it would be a great try but it is terrible. It has a terrible smell that reminds me of cow patty and it leaves the hair completely oily. I did not have the opportunity to see if it would help in moisturizing the hair, as I will have to find another way to use this product. Maybe it can be good for an overnight mask for the hair. Until I find another use for this product, it is staying in my bathroom cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Segura

customer_reviews.title: Nice product; LOUSY dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I love that the oil is fragrance-free and easily absorbed into the skin but the dispenser is awful....hard to press and it leaks. There is always oily residue on the bottle and on my counter top...ALWAYS... even though I wipe it clean after use. It's obviously slowly leaking. I'm likely to consider another brand with my next purchase. Too much waste and mess.
customer_reviews.author: Sew Mary Beth

customer_reviews.title: in fact my skin looks worse: O - And the off smell has increased
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this about 4-5 months ago and noticed that it had an odor that was particular and different from the previous brand I had. I have used oils for many years and immediately thought it smelled "chemically". I have continued to use it thinking it may just be the brand, but now have noticed it is not moisturizing my face, in fact my skin looks worse :O - And the off smell has increased. Throwing the rest out and trying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorYogini

customer_reviews.title: This DOES cause acne
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a moisturizer to use here and there when my skin got too dry from my other moisturizer. Broke out immediately, but i was already breaking out. Tried a couple weeks later and broke out again. Online they claim that this oil doesn't clog pores and moisturizes. Not my experience. Breaking out in places i normally don't (temples, cheeks)
customer_reviews.author: JVRod

customer_reviews.title: JOJOBA OIL IS MY FAVORITE!!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from plaque psoriasis so using moisturizing oils is a must for me. I LOVE using VIVA Jojoba oil. I saturate my entire body with it after showering while my skin is still damp. I keep a spray bottle in the shower & if my skin begins to dry I mist my skin with water & apply the oil. Jojoba is a thin lightweight oil & when applied to damp skin it will penetrate into your skin quickly leaving your skin super soft but not a greasy mess. It gives your skin more of a glowy-dewy look. I am on my 3rd bottle & ready to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L.

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I thought I should finally write a review on this joboba oil, seeing as I’ve been using it for about 7 or 8 months now. I LOVE this stuff. I use it on my face every morning and every night together with the Teddie Organics rose water and my skin has never been happier. When using it in the very beginning my skin tended to react by breaking out very slightly, but now it seems to have evened out its oil production and my skin has been so clear and happy. Love that it’s one ingredient and your skin will love it too!!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil, recently repurchased this after 3 long years of trying to find an otc cream to help my acne and moisturize my skin really well without feeling heavy. This is it. I should’ve never stoped using this. I love the pump although it’s tough to control the amount you get but if that’s really a problem just buy a dropper or use a qtip to get some out. It’s a really nice oil and it comes with enough product to last about half a year or more depending on what you use it for. My skin just soaks it up and doesn’t complain. Will 100% repurchase with out a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Evans

customer_reviews.title: Viva Naturals brand oil leaves my skin feeling just as good and I get twice as much for half the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used Organic Moroccan Argan Oil on my face and neck every morning and night for the past 2 years. I switched to Viva Naturals brand a couple of weeks ago since Foxbrim brand raised their prices. Viva Naturals brand oil leaves my skin feeling just as good and I get twice as much for half the price!! I wish I would have discovered Viva Naturals brand years ago!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Carbott

customer_reviews.title: NOT 100% PURE ARGAN OIL!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is not pure argan oil!!! It had no nutty smell, it had a clearer look and a thicker feel than true 100% argan oil. I used it on my face/neck for the first time and woke up greasy with oil on my skin still. I will not use it again, I am returning it. Sometimes you get what you pay for and in this case that’s so true.
customer_reviews.author: wildhare0223

customer_reviews.title: It's a great conditioner for hair and works awesome as a moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and silky. It's a great conditioner for hair and works awesome as a moisturizer. I can't say I've used it on my face for acne as many do but you can tell it's of quality, pure and unrefined. I gave it 4 stars since, while I like the concept of the bottle design, the pump can be stubborn and doesn't allow much control of how much oil you'd like to use at once. Since jojoba doesn't oxidize as easily as other oils, the brand could consider going back to a dropper. Although, since 4 oz bottles and droppers seem to be faulty, they should consider selling smaller portions so the droppers don't break as easily in the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: EHunter

customer_reviews.title: Good pump design, but poor execution
customer_reviews.text: I like the oil and I really like the pump vs the dropper that most other jojoba oils have. However, it often "sticks" and I have to press down hard to get the oil to come out and then a lot comes out. So I think the pump would be great if it was a little better quality.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great oil, poor quality bottle
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality jojoba oil; however, I purchased this brand in particular because of the pump bottle. I figured it would make it easier/faster to use. Unfortunately, the pump got stuck with every use and tended to squirt the oil across the bathroom. I emailed the company and they offered a replacement and said that the pump should not do this. I received a new bottle of oil and a new pump. The new pump has the same issue as the first. Good customer service, but the pump makes it a hassle to use. I have to guard my hand around the whole cap to make sure it doesn't hit the walls when I use it
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am 42 and have been struggling with cyst acne for the past few years. I was my face day and night with jojoba oil and my face has never looked better. Other products dry out and make my face red and irritated. Jojoba oil gives my skin what it need to look and feel healthy. I recently used it on a severe sunburn and the jojoba oil started healing it overnight. I recommend this product to everyone. Helps with acne, scars, eczema, sunburn.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This oil doesn't feel as nice in my hair--I think I saved only one or ...
customer_reviews.text: I prefer GoPure. This oil doesn't feel as nice in my hair--I think I saved only one or two bucks using Viva... it would have been better to spend that money on a product that I know is quality. I mix this oil with essential oils (carrot/lemon/ylang ylang) to increase it benefits. I did not have to do that with GoPure's oil.
customer_reviews.author: insertwittyhandle

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it saved my hair after a severely drying color treatment
customer_reviews.text: This saved me from chopping off 2 inches. My hair was stripped dry from cleansing shampoo after being dyed too dark. I got a ton of split ends from it. If your hair is not absorbing moisture from anything you try like mine was, you need to use this on wet shampoo'd hair alone. I only avoided my roots since they're okay. Let it soak for at least a few minutes before rinsing. Don't shampoo after. My hair bends softly after one treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M

customer_reviews.title: helpful for dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely dry eyes & a lot of indoor allergies cause the corner of my eyes to redden & become very irritated. I have tried many eye creams & other dry skin lotions to stop the skin from cracking around the eye. I tried putting just a touch on a cotton ball on the corners of my eyes before bed & in the morning, redness & cracking gone. It is very greasy so caution getting it in the eye...takes awhile to sink in but pretty amazing stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cat knocked it off the counter and when the bottle broke open there was something that looked like scum or algae
customer_reviews.text: Formed a white crust on my skin that would flake off. My cat knocked it off the counter and when the bottle broke open there was something that looked like scum or algae. I had only had it for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: lizmarie feola

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use in making homemade lotion. I used it to mix with raw shea and coconut oil. This oil is fantastic! It helped bring a smooth texture to my lotion and is in a glass bottle, which I appreciated! Shipping was fast and arrived promptly. Viva Naturals also reached out to check on my experience to ensure I was satisfied. I really appreciate the customer service, as this is not a cheap purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Natural Mama

customer_reviews.title: This works great on my hair
customer_reviews.text: My usual oil spray that I loved has been discontinued. I was looking for a replacement. I can across the Viva Argan oil and Johoba oil and wanted to try them both. This was a very good price compared to the others I saw. I liked the fact that it came in a glass bottle that can be re-used. This leaves a bit of a sheen on your skin . I especially like it on my hair. I use coconut oil or coco butter for a hint of scent. I use this all over.. A little goes a long way, my hair is very long ( past my hips) and it is very dry, so it works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: Bottle pumps hard & makes a mess
customer_reviews.text: I like the product just fine, but the pump is really awful. In order to use it you have to hold it with one had and press down on the pump head with the other...then it frequently will spurt in different directions, making a mess . I've used it with one hand while it was sitting on the counter and it will spray over my hand and a good 12-16 inches in multi directions. So annoying I just took the top off & dump it into my hand & that is not ideal as the oil makes things very slippery. I will not purchase this again as alot of product is wasted (plus the mess!)
customer_reviews.author: BookshireCrone

customer_reviews.title: ... been using other organic argan oil but I am disappointed in this product due to its extreme odor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I had been using other organic argan oil but I am disappointed in this product due to its extreme odor. It smells extremely unpleasant. I tried to mask the smell with perfume and grapefruit extract but the smell still seems to come through. Will not be buying again, but I do recommend argan oil in general.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Absorbs well in my skin. I literally can feel my skin change the same day and lasted all day (face/body)!..I use it in my daily moisturizer and undereye cream. I have seen a difference in skin my face texture/softness.feels hydrated and suple. I use it along with shea butter once out the shower while lightly wet..i will start using in my hair as well..im glad i went with this brand. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have EXTREMELY dry hands and my cuticles crack really easy. This stuff has been awesome in helping with both. I also mix it in with my body lotion and my skin feels amazing. My only complaint is the bottle....it leaks REALLY bad. When I pump some out whatever is left in the pump leaks everywhere. It'd be great if they fixed that. Otherwise great stuff
customer_reviews.author: Adenton67

customer_reviews.title: Try it, you'll love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I was told by a friend that the reason she has such great skin was because of this organic jojoba oil. So I purchased it hoping I would at least have better skin than I have now. I love this product. My face is a little dry and I use this every night before bed and again in the morning. My skin is soft and glowing and I think I'm going to keep up this regime from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Schreiner

customer_reviews.title: I love this. However
customer_reviews.text: I love this. However, I need some advice from anyone experiencing the same reaction.... i put this oil lightly on damp hair every time i shower. Ive noticed halfway down, my hair dries fused in these very hard clumps. Almost as if I had used glue on my hair. its so weird. I dont know if this is the argan oil or the moroccan oil mask WITH the argan oil thats causing this but Ive clarified my hair and am taking a break from all products for a while. Has anyone experienced this withthe argan oil?
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Nazario

customer_reviews.title: Saving grace!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love this product. I used to have horrible cystic acne and I discovered that the chemicals in the moisturizers I was using were actually the problem. I turned to this jojoba oil as my new moisturizer and it is incredible. This is a light oil that absorbs right into the skin, it is very similar to skins natural sebum in terms of chemical composition. I suggest to all that are struggling with acne to consider if all of the products that are supposed to help the condition are actually the root of the problem. Your skin will be much happier without them and will love this oil!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha b.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my makeup and skin regimen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with the makeup creasing under my eyes and it actually works! I apply my concealer as usual and then rub in a tiny drop of this oil and it helps set my makeup all day. No more creasing. It also gives my skin a brighter appearance. I also apply this oil to my entire face after using a facial mask to help restore the moisture in my skin and it works great. I have acne prone skin and this hasn’t made me break out at all. I’ve been using it for about a month. It also comes in a huge bottle, which will last a very long time. Definitely a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Jheneya

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Smells a tiny bit earthy and makes face feel a bit oily to the touch but it is a clean oil feeling. It totally has helped my whole head regulate its oil production (I apply about 4 squirts to my face morning and night). My acne is pretty much gone and I’m noticing my sun spots decreasing. I would highly recommend it. (Another note: I have always had very oily skin and battled acne)
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 1 yr old

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: The smell is really bad on its own, but you can add to it, though it doesn’t help much and just makes this product even more expensive. It doesn’t absorb well and I haven’t noticed much of a difference over using lotion, even when combined. I also didn’t receive a pump for it as shown in the picture so it makes it hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Navikator

customer_reviews.title: Favorite oil
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite facial and body oil. I add a itty bitty tiny drop to my moisturizer, and a few drops to my body lotion. It helps a lot during the winter months when I will get mild enzymes from dryness. It does takes 10-20 min to be absorbed, but there’s no greasy feeling left on the skin. I also rub a drop or two in rough patches and scars before going to bed. My scars are noticeably fading overnight, and the rough patches softened overtimes.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Best facial moisturizer EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Argan oil is the best facial and hair moisturizer for me. This brand is pure. Other brands of argan oil that I've tried have been heavier and caused my skin to break out in acne. I only need 3 drops to moisturize my whole face and then I run my fingers through my hair afterward to give it moisture and a smoothing sheen. For deeper hair moisturization, I recommend trying an organic jojoba or even olive oil. Argan oil is too precious to use in such a large amount as a hair deep oil treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Instant difference
customer_reviews.text: I use sweet almond oil from the same brand for cleansing my face, and use this after as a moisturizer. I noticed an immediate difference. My skin feels like it did 20 years ago. I will never go back to using soap and lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size bottle for the price. I bought it for my hair and skin. I haven’t noticed much of a difference yet as I just got it but it does moisturize my hair well between washes. Also it doesn’t have a strong scent at all. An essential oil could be used if you want a pleasant scent. I am satisfied thus far.
customer_reviews.author: L. Creighton

customer_reviews.title: Great service and great product!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely oil; my skin just drinks it in! I use it in various oil blends, but often just apply it directly to my skin. Pretty much odorless, but something about its (extremely mild) scent makes me crave bologna... go figure :D. When it arrived, the dropper it came with barely held the oil--it would all fall out before I could get it into my hand. I contacted the seller and they were so friendly and efficient! They immediately replaced it for me and checked to make sure I was all taken care of. Great service and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Cheshirepuss

customer_reviews.title: Safely swipped and packaged well
customer_reviews.text: The oil was nicely packaged and safely shipped, I needed something that would help keep my skin moisturized as it was literally peeling off due to swimming daily in a very heavily chlorinated gym pool. So far it has certainly helped and the peeling has stopped. Like other said, the pump on the top seems like it's clogged (it isn't) but it will just shoot out, that is the only issue I have with this product. Other than that, it has been helping keep my face from peeling like a lizard.
customer_reviews.author: 00Batman

customer_reviews.title: I've used it for a couple weeks and really like how it's a little lighter than some other oils
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for a couple weeks and really like how it's a little lighter than some other oils. 5 stars for the oil but a note to the manufacturer...don't know if I got a defective pump or that's how they are but mine does not push down smoothly. It seems to be stuck (every time!) and I have to push it a little hard, then it squirts out too much and makes a bit of a mess on the bottle. Not a huge thing but any mess that includes cleaning up oil is annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: ... was becoming very dry and patchy and progressively getting worse, I tried many moisturizers and natural oils but ...
customer_reviews.text: My skin was becoming very dry and patchy and progressively getting worse, I tried many moisturizers and natural oils but nothing was helping. I read about jojoba oil for skin and decided to try it. For a week I used this daily & immediately saw results. My skin has gone back to normal. Now I use it about once every week with my moisturizing routine and it leaves my skin very soft without being clogged or oily feeling
customer_reviews.author: Aza Daye

customer_reviews.title: Rash on face!!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOTTTT buy. I was overly confident with buying because of the good reviews, that I did not pay attention to the patterns and dates within the bad reviews. Most of the bad reviews are more recent, yet all say similar things I say this because my face experienced a break out immeadiatly! I have good skin and my entire face was covered in small red bumps! Also, it smells nothing like well scented Argan Oil, it stinks horribly.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: I primarily use it on my hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair is dry and frizzes in humid weather. I’ve tried many hair products, including products especially for African American hair, (which work the best, I am Caucasian) but Nothing has worked as well as this product. I use 4 drops and massage through wet hair, wrap my head in a towel for about 15 minutes and blow dry. I can not believe what a difference it has made. I highly recommend this jojoba oil. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn McGuire Downie

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is good quality product. But, the pump is poor quality. It’s hard to use, I have to press down really hard and it requires 2 hands. I just think they they should provide a decent pump!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: helps manage curls
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by a friend for curly hair. I tried it and it does indeed take out the "frizz." It makes the hair feel soft and more manageable. Strangely enough, I never had curly hair before. I lost all my hair while undergoing chemo therapy for cancer, and when it started to grow in, it was all curls! So my friend had to give me advice on how to manage. I also tried the oil on my face, where it seems to be helping fine lines on the upper lip. So far I have had good success with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Goldowsky

customer_reviews.title: Works well on dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: Am in my 70's and have very dry skin. Love this product. Have not experience any skin reaction or acne from it after 3 months of use. May not use during the summer because it is straight oil, but will continue to use during the winter. Am very pleased with it especially after spending hundreds of dollars on expensive face creams. Plus, one squirt on my hand is enough for my whole face.
customer_reviews.author: Doogal's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product, terrible pump.
customer_reviews.text: The oil is great. It absorbs well, doesn't stink, and doesn't taste bad if you get it on your lips. However, the pump is just awful. It produces a fast tiny squirt that slashes all over. The bottle gets all greasy and you can't regulate the amount you get like you can do with a regular lotion bottle.
customer_reviews.author: C.Tarbet

customer_reviews.title: Great use as a beard oil!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and pretty affordable. I use this for my hair (I'm a guy) as a light and natural hair product that helps with dry and frizzy feeling hair. My advice: - you can use this as a beard oil, which is a lot cheaper than some other beard specific products - order a small bottle of scented oil and put a few drops into the container to make your own!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the hair and great for the body
customer_reviews.text: This oil has so many uses. I use it on my body as a moisturizer, and on my face as well. But what is has done for my hair is fantastic. I just rub a few drops in my hands and distribute it through my hair with a concentration on the ends before I wash my hair and use cream rinse as I always do. This oil leaves a natural protectant on the hair so it tolerates a quick blow dry extremely well and comes out soft and manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Binnie

customer_reviews.title: Great company, awesome products!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! This is the second product I have bought from Viva naturals and I have loved both. I had a question about the first product I bought from them and reached out and the customer service was excellent as well. This is the only company I will buy my jojoba oil and shea butter from.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so great pump...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product but the pump was faulty this time. I've ordered this product in the past and never had an issue with the packaging; however, the pump must've changed since then. The pump was very hard to push down and it did go down oil leaked everywhere. I ended up pouring it into another bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light, feels divine on my skin
customer_reviews.text: Wash my face with this constantly, does not feel oily, follow with toner, serum and moisturizer; massage it in, no need to wipe off. If it were practical, I'd use it over my whole body, but there's other oils for that that are more affordable and go a long way
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Emerson

customer_reviews.title: my hair likes argon oil
customer_reviews.text: Using product on hair and skin. Works well in my very thick wiry hair without feeling or looking greased. With my hair I have to reapply everyday. Doesn't leave residue. Nice. Feels good on skin and face too. Thank you. I love that it is organic. Too bad we have to even say that in modern agriculture. All plants should be free of pesticides and other nature killing products; so that is much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: L.D.

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: This came smelling rancid, and I tried to make it work by telling myself that it wasn't; but I cannot deny it any further. I purchased another brand before this one, and it smelled like nothing, and worked beautifully (moisturizing). I should have returned this as soon as I received it.
customer_reviews.author: NatalieDallas

customer_reviews.title: Decent versatile product, but sucky packaging
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using jojoba oil and I don’t see any drastic differences (I’ve been using it for about a month). I will continue to use it because I love that it’s such a versatile product that I can use for my face, hair, etc. The only downside is the packaging, I thought having a pump instead of the usual dropper would be better. However there is not much control with how much product to dispense due to the pump. I also find that it leaks a lot of product even though it’s sitting upright. Decent product, but would try another when I’m finished with this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: acbe

customer_reviews.title: Great for your skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and so far this has not bothered me at all. I use it right out of the shower and it has made my skin so silky soft! It doesn't leave me feeling greasy or sticky. The smell is not overpowering at all. Awesome thing about this is I can use it from the top of my head to the bottom of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gray

customer_reviews.title: It is very nice, pure oil
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice, pure oil. Came in a larger bottle than I was expecting, so that was a nice surprise ( I have only previously purchased bottles from beauty supply stores in town). I use the oil to help my bad dandruff and dry scalp. It seems to work well. It keeps down the itching. My husband uses it in his beard to keep hit beard soft. 5/5 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.T.

customer_reviews.title: I immediately ordered some and LOVE it. However
customer_reviews.text: My daughter told me about jojoba oil. I immediately ordered some and LOVE it. However, I do not like the dispenser. When you press down on the plunger it is hard to press down. I have to hold the bottle in one hand and then press down on the plunger. When the oil comes out it is everywhere. Next time I will order a different one because this is messy.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Does the job I bought it for
customer_reviews.text: It works like most oils, really does not have a scent. My understanding is lack of scent is due to its process, and grade. I like it a little better when mixed with other oils, I think I like the nice smell. I use it because I have long hair and I brush it through my hair to keep it healthy and tangle free.
customer_reviews.author: Love  Mytea

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've used argan oil before. This one has a lighter scent because of the extra purification step, but that doesn't detract from its quality. I like that it's certified organic. Will definitely be buying this again, even though it's on the pricier side. (By the way, because I read of some people having issues - the expiration date of the one I received is over 2 years from now.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So very glad I choose this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible oil! I bought it because it had a near prefect customer rating, so I decided to give it a try. I used it on my skin and hair and it has improved them both. Previously my scalp reacted poorly to any kind of oil treated which limited how I could deep condition my hair. My scalp, hair, and skin love this stuff! I tried this on a lawk and I am so pleased and plan to continue to use this for the rest of my life. Thank you Viva Naturals for making such a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Liquid gold!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for the oil cleansing method for 4 months and my skin has never looked better, even when I was using expensive cleansers and moisturizers. This stuff is like liquid gold! I use it on my hair as a deep conditioner and nails as a nail oil as well. You can't beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great seller and nice product
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue at first with having received a leaky product. Since I wasn't sure how long that bottle had been open enough to leak, I didn't want to use it, but the seller was super responsive and got me a fresh bottle as quickly as they could. The product is very nice, no scent, and works exactly like I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not for all hair types
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my hair. I would apply it after towel drying my hair. Once my hair would air dry my hair looked oily or like I had used some sort of styling product. This isn't what I was hoping for. I have no doubt that this oil is moisturizing and good for your hair but its not what I was looking for. Seems as though this oil may be too thick for some hair types. I have used kerastase marula oil and ogx argan oil in the past and after applying either of them to towel dried hair, the oil would absorb, my hair would air dry and feel very soft (not like an oily residue).
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Great for cuticles
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a cuticle oil daily. It is very high quality, absorbs well, smells neutral, and moisturizes well. It is a great value for the price -- a few drops go a long way so this large bottle will probably go bad before I can even use it all. Gotta use it to make some homemade lotion or something!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Coburn-SchillTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Healthier Skin
customer_reviews.text: No scent, not grecy. This is my first time using Jojoba oil. I did not regret it at all. I use it twice daily. In the morning, I apply it after the syrum, then I apply cream and sunblock, and I can put some makeup if I want. I put it before sleep time as well. It makes my skin looks healthier in all aspects.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Better options
customer_reviews.text: Pump didn’t work great. Not a lot of product for the price- tried a different brand and it’s organic and of the same quality in my opinion, has a great pump and probably triple the amount of product.
customer_reviews.author: Tennielle Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Love the oil, hate the bottle
customer_reviews.text: Jojoba oil is great for hair and skin, but this glass bottle with pump is awful. I lose as much oil as I use, tho I take great care to pump directly into my cupped palm. The bottle somehow gets coated in oil, so I'm afraid it will slip & break in the sink, and there is always a puddle under it on the counter. Will go back to a plastic bottle with shaker top, which means another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen S.

customer_reviews.title: Argan oil had a very nice light feel on the skin
customer_reviews.text: Argan oil had a very nice light feel on the skin, I prefer straight argon oil to other moisturizers. This pump puts out a good amount for my face and neck, and I like the pump instead of the dropper (which other brands use), because I can accidently touch the dropper top on my hand and introduce bacteria to the last. With the pump the pump the oil stays bacteria free.
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Not Pleased
customer_reviews.text: It had a funky weird smell that was not previously in my Aria Starr's Argan oil bottle. It also didn't absorb well into my skin. I had to return it. Although Aria Starr sells it for much more, the quality is also much better.
customer_reviews.author: sabv

customer_reviews.title: Good, no scent.
customer_reviews.text: No scent but it does feel like argan oil and moisturizes the skin fairly well. Instructions say to add it to the user's regular moistizing cream, and since I don't use any, I mix it equal parts with olive oil. Works fine for me (but I'm no fashion model ;-)
customer_reviews.author: AlchemistOfLife

customer_reviews.title: ... Jojoba oil is the most safest natural oil that best comes close to imitating the actual oil ur face ...
customer_reviews.text: Organic Jojoba oil is the most safest natural oil that best comes close to imitating the actual oil ur face produces. Which is a good thing, there's such a bad rap on face oil but its actually a natural defense against germs & bacteria. Also Jajoba oil keeps the face moisturized to help prevent premature wrinkles that mostly happens at night while sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a month now and I love it! I have rosacea and my skin is sensitive. I've tried using other products but wanted something more natural. This really works as a natural moisturizer. It also is an amazing brightener. When I put it on my face glows. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Nassem

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is the real deal I can tell by the scent and color, it hasn't been as refined or process as others can be. This is how oils are meant to be cold pressed, solvent free, unrefined with their vitamins, minerals and fatty acids intact. Thank you Viva Naturals! I will be trying your other oils.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Will always purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this oil to use as a mixture of oils for my face cream, I don't use much with this oil. Love this product, I'm repurchasing. I've created face screams, using this oil. I am brown skin and once I apply this oil my skin starts to glow. I use this oil daily; after my shower, before my makeup (wait about 10 min before applying primer and makeup, just to allow the oil to fully sink into my skin. Doing this process will make sure my makeup doesn't appear oily), and before I go to bed. I did not give this product 5 stars because the tube used to get the oil did not fill up when squeezed.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I use this for psoriasis of the scalp in between prescription med applications. It helps reduce flaking without making the hair look oily so I can use it both during the day and overnight. I like that it is a little lighter/thinner than other brands so it is easier to apply more directly to the scalp instead of the hair. It helps.
customer_reviews.author: Luke's Mom

customer_reviews.title: I've been using Argan oil for about a month, ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Argan oil for about a month, primarily all over my face. I especially needed something for the dryness under and above my eyes, as my "senior citizen" skin was dry and flaky. This product certainly does the trick. The oil is surprisingly not greasy. It absorbs quickly into my skin and gives it a glow, and I often find myself skipping any other moisture lotion. I expected my skin to break out, but so far it hasn't. I will definitely re-order this oil when I run low.
customer_reviews.author: Vin

product_meta.title: Certified Organic Jojoba Oil ; 100% Pure & Cold Pressed, Natural Moisturizer for Face and Hair and Great for all Skin DIYs (Polishes, Masks, Body), 4 oz
product_meta.description:
Scent:JojobaCold-pressed from the seeds of the Jojoba shrub and certified USDA organic, Viva Naturals Organic Jojoba Oil is the natural way to keep your skin, hair and nails hydrated. Our Jojoba Oil is extracted without heat to preserve its skin-nourishing essential fatty acids.* Hydrating all on its own, it can also be used in DIY skincare recipes.* Click Add to cart now to discover your new all-purpose skincare (and hair care!) secret. . 
How can I use it?- It’s a great all-purpose moisturizer. Use it alone on damp or dry skin after a shower or bath. It can also be used to moisturize the nail bed or cuticles, keep beards from becoming dry and brittle, or even as a gentle, all-natural makeup remover. Make Jojoba Oil the base for your next do-it-yourself beauty blend—use it in body scrubs, lip balms, or facial oils. 
Is it actually pure Jojoba Oil?- Yes. Viva Naturals Organic Jojoba Oil is certified USDA organic, hexane-free, cruelty-free and fragrance-free. It’s extracted by cold-pressing the Jojoba Seed (100% Organic Simmondsia Chinensis) leaving a golden, oily liquid with a slightly nutty scent. Our process preserves wax esters—fatty acids that retain moisture in the skin and hair.* That’s why, when you do the “fridge test” (by putting the oil in the fridge) it’ll turn solid—those are the wax esters solidifying! 
We’re all looking for ways to do our bodies good. Jojoba Oil makes it simple to bring balance back into the body by hydrating skin, hair, cuticles and face, in one all-natural, all-purpose step.
feature_bullets: GREAT BASE FOR DIY SKIN CARE - Jojoba Oil’s mild, nutty scent and all-purpose benefits make it an ideal carrier oil for your favorite DIYs. Use it in facial oils, facial polishes, body scrubs, face serums and massage oils, or alone as an easy and natural eye-makeup remover.

KEEPS FACE & BODY SOFT & HYDRATED - Environmental factors and harsh chemicals can be hard on our skin. Give your skin’s hydration levels a boost by locking in essential fatty acids with our Organic Jojoba Oil.
NO ADDITIVES OR PRESERVATIVES - Our Jojoba Oil is USDA organic, hexane-free, fragrance-free and made without any additives, allergens or preservatives.
NATURALLY CONDITIONS - When your hair is hydrated, it’s softer, shinier and more manageable. The wax esters in our Organic Jojoba Oil condition the hair, keeping it from looking dull
YOUR HANDS & NAILS WILL THANK YOU – Naturally rich in essential fatty acids and other skin-embracing components, Jojoba Oil glides on silky smooth, quenching thirsty hands, fingernails and cuticles.
